alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 11:59AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer County through 1245 PM CDT... At 1158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merna, or near Broken Bow, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Merna, Anselmo and Victoria Springs State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 249 and 278. Highway 92 between mile markers 266 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
